feed.title: La Grande Rivière - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -23.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 10:26 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -23.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -26.1°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
